channel.name: 04-Test Data Generator
channel.description:
This channel generates random HL7 ADT messages and then writes them to disk.
The Source component generates a new HL7 ADT message every 10 seconds.
The Filter component is not in use.
The destination component writes the generated messages to the /Demo/Messages folder.
More information: http://wiki.interfaceware.com/1372.html

from_mapper.commit_comment: Committing translator data for imported channel(s).
